Vessel Control

Initiate Bioreactor/Vessel Input Valve Interact Output Vave Interact
Fill Percent pH Temperature Pressure
Pass/Fail Fill Percent pH - Low pH - High pH - Average Temperature - Low Temperature - High Temperature - Average Pressure - Low Pressure - High Pressure - Average Total Time

Steps:

  1. Initiate the Bioreactor or Vessel.
  2. Open the input valve to allow material in.
  3. Let the vessel fill to (70 +/-2)% full.
  4. If pressure of the vessel reaches 200kPa or greater, you should immediately abort the process by opening the output valve.
  5. When the temperature of the container reaches (80 +/-1) degrees Celsius, open the output valve to let the material out.
